welcome.title: Welcome to Adelfa
welcome.subtitle: Let's set up your email, calendar, and contacts
welcome.description: Adelfa can manage your email accounts and synchronize calendars and contacts from the same providers. This wizard will guide you through the setup process.
welcome.feature_email: Email management with multiple account support
welcome.feature_security: Secure credential storage with system keyring

provider_selection.title: Choose Your Provider
provider_selection.subtitle: Select your email provider or set up manually
provider_selection.manual_info: For manual setup, you will need to configure server settings yourself. This is useful for custom email servers or when automatic detection fails.
provider_selection.detection_failed: Could not detect settings automatically. Please set up manually.

account_details.title: Account Details
account_details.subtitle: Configure your account settings
account_details.save_password_help: Passwords are stored securely using your system's keyring

server_settings.title: Server Settings
server_settings.subtitle: Configure email server details
server_settings.use_same_credentials: Use same credentials as incoming mail

calendar_contacts.title: Calendar & Contacts
calendar_contacts.subtitle: Set up calendar and contact synchronization

errors.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.empty_credentials: Please enter both username and password
errors.no_server_settings: No server settings available. Please configure manually.
errors.no_imap_settings: No IMAP settings found for testing.
errors.invalid_port: Port must be a number between 1 and 65535
errors.authentication_failed: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials.
errors.server_not_found: Server not found. Please check the server address.

help.title: Help
help.general: This wizard will help you set up your email account with calendar and contacts synchronization. Follow the steps and provide the required information for each page.

tooltips.account_name: A friendly name to identify this account in the application
tooltips.display_name: Your name as it appears in outgoing emails
tooltips.imap: IMAP allows you to access your email from multiple devices and keeps them synchronized
tooltips.pop3: POP3 downloads emails to this device only
tooltips.starttls: Upgrade connection to encrypted after initial connection
tooltips.tls_ssl: Use encrypted connection from the start
tooltips.caldav: CalDAV is the standard protocol for calendar synchronization
tooltips.carddav: CardDAV is the standard protocol for contact synchronization
